404_not_found: The requested page can not be found.
candidates_with_a_score_lower_than: Candidates with a score lower than {{score}}%
confirm_assign_to_user_message: Please choose a member to assign all selected jobs to.
confirm_assign_to_user_type_name: Please enter '{{name}}' to confirm that you really want to assign all selected jobs to this member.
confirm_connect_message: You're about to connect with a candidate. Once you connect and the candidate does the same, you'll have a match and will get notified.
confirm_delete_draft_message: Do you really want to delete the draft '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
confirm_delete_user_text_assign: Please choose a member to assign all of {{name}}'s active jobs and matches to.
confirm_delete_user_type_name: Please enter '{{name}}' to confirm that you really want this member erased. This action cannot be undone.
confirm_delete_user_input_placeholder: Enter the member's name to confirm
confirm_dismiss_message: You're about to dismiss a candidate. Once you dismiss, you won't see this candidate for this job offer again.
confirm_dismiss_matching_message: You're about to dismiss a match. Please enter '{{name}}' to confirm that you really want to dismiss this match. This action cannot be undone.
confirm_dismiss_matching_input_placehold: Enter the name of the candidate to confirm
confirm_invite_input_placeholder: Enter the email addresses you'd like to send invites to
confirm_match_message: You're about to match with a candidate. Once you match, you'll find it under the tab 'Matches' and are able to contact him or her.
confirm_terminate_job_message: You're about to terminate a job offer. Please enter '{{name}}' to confirm that you really want to terminate this job offer. This action cannot be undone.
confirm_terminate_job_input_placeholder: Enter the title of the job offer to confirm
confirm_transfer_master_role_input_place: Enter the member's name to confirm
confirm_transfer_master_role_type_name: Please enter '{{name}}' to confirm that you really want to transfer your master role to him/her.
confirm_revoke_invitation_message: Do you really want to revoke the invitation to '{{name}}'?
confirmed_registration:
You successfully completed your registration.
You can sign-in now.
help_text:
If you're having troubles with your hocaboo account feel free to contact us directly via the little chat box on the bottom right.
You can also write us an email at help@hocaboo.com. Our team is happy to hear from you!
hotel_image_upload_note: You can upload up to 5 images. You can re-arrange them by dragging them. To get the best looking result, your images should have a side ratio of about 1 to 0.6. Otherwise they will be cropped to fit that ratio.
hotel_image_upload_restrictions: PNG, JPG or GIF ({{kb}}kb max file size, max pixel sizes of 2,600x2,600)
hotel_logo_upload_restrictions: PNG, JPG or GIF ({{kb}}kb max file size, max pixel sizes of 2,600x2,600)
hotel_or_group_header: What would you like to join?
invitation_intro:
The {{name}} invited you to join their Team.
Fill out the following to accept the invitation.
job_offer_has_no_matchings: This job offer has no matches.
looking_for_hoteljob: Looking for a hotel job? This way!
name: Name
no_candidate_list_yet: We don't have a candidate list for you yet. Please check again later.
no_invoice_list_yet: You don't have any invoices yet.
no_potentials_list_yet: You don't have any pending candidates.
no_matching_list_yet: You don't have any matches yet.
no_interested_list_yet: You don't have any applicants yet.
not_found_the_right_candidate_yet: Still haven't found the right candidate?
preview_subline: As the user can see it
profile_image_upload_note: Make sure your profile image has a square format, otherwise it will be cropped to fit the square format.
profile_image_upload_restrictions: PNG, JPG or GIF ({{kb}}kb max file size, max pixel sizes of 2,600x2600)
recovery_confirm_mail: We've sent you an E-Mail with a confirmation link. Please check your mails.
register_now: You don't have an account yet? Register now!
registration_complete_confirm_mail: We've sent you an E-Mail with a confirmation link. Please check your mails.
sign_in_now: Already have an account? Sign in now!
unverified_account_note_details: Your account still needs to be verified by our team. Until then you will not be able to publish job offers, but you can already save drafts. We send you an email as soon as your account will be updated!
use_group_address_as_billing_address: Use group address as billing address
use_hotel_address_as_billing_address: Use hotel address as billing address

_errors.address_invalid: Error: You must enter an address.
_errors.already_master: Error: The member you chose already has a master role.
_errors.billingaddress_invalid: Error: You must enter an address.
_errors.billingcity_missing: Error: You must enter a city.
_errors.billingcompany_invalid: Error: You must enter a company name.
_errors.billingcountry_invalid: Error: You must enter a country.
_errors.billingregion_invalid: Error: You must enter a region.
_errors.billingzip_invalid: Error: You must enter a zip code.
_errors.categories_invalid: Error: You must choose at least one category.
_errors.city_missing: Error: You must enter a city.
_errors.confirm_failed: Error: We were unable to confirm your registration. Please try again or contact us.
_errors.confirm_invite_failed: Error: Your invitation has expired. If you haven't registered yet, ask your Hotel Master for a new invitation.
_errors.contractType_invalid: Error: You must choose a contract type.
_errors.country_invalid: Error: You must enter a country.
_errors.delete_user_no_transfer: Error: You must choose someone to assign all jobs and matches to.
_errors.delete_user_incorrect_name: Error: You must enter the name of the member.
_errors.description_too_long: Error: Your description is too long. Please use a maximum of 7500 characters.
_errors.description_too_short: Error: You must enter a description with at least 100 characters.
_errors.dismiss_matching_incorrect_name: Error: You must enter the name of the candidate.
_errors.employmentType_invalid: Error: You must choose an employment type.
_errors.field_invalid: Error: You must choose a job field.
_errors.firstname_too_long: Error: The first name you've entered is too long. Please use a maximum of 24 characters.
_errors.firstname_too_short: Error: You're first name must have at least 2 characters.
_errors.hotel_is_not_verified: Error: Your hotel is not yet verified by the hocaboo admin team! Please have some patience and/or write us an email.
_errors.invalid_rights: Error: You do not have the necessary rights needed to perform this action.
_errors.invalid_delete_user: Error: The member you want to delete does not exist.
_errors.invalid_user: Error: The member you have chosen does not exist.
_errors.invalid_assignee: Error: The member you have chosen does not exist.
_errors.invalid_transfer_user: Error: The member you chose to assign jobs and matches to does not exist.
_errors.image_invalid_hotel_logo:
Upload error

Please be aware of the allowed image extensions (JPG/JPEG, PNG, GIF) and file sizes: max 1.5MB and max pixel sizes of 2,600x2,600.

If you have any problems uploading an image, you can also send it to us. We would love to take care of it!
_errors.image_invalid_hotel_image:
Upload error

Please be aware of the allowed image extensions (JPG/JPEG, PNG, GIF) and file sizes: max 1.5MB and max pixel sizes of 2,600x2,600. You can not upload more than 5 images.

If you have any problems uploading images, you can also send them to us. We would love to take care of it!
_errors.image_invalid_profile_image:
Upload error

Please be aware of the allowed image extensions (JPG/JPEG, PNG, GIF) and file sizes: max 1.5MB and max pixel sizes of 2,600x2,600. The optimal profile image has a square format.

If you have any problems uploading an image, you can also send it to us. We would love to take care of it!
_errors.language_incomplete: Error: You must either enter language and skill or remove both.
_errors.lastname_too_long: Error: The last name you've entered is too long. Please use a maximum of 24 characters.
_errors.lastname_too_short: Error: You're last name must have at least 2 characters.
_errors.mailconfirm_unequal: Error: The mail addresses you have entered don't match.
_errors.mail_invalid: Error: The mail address you've entered is invalid.
_errors.mail_duplicate: Error: The mail address you have entered is already in use.
_errors.mail_invited: Error: The mail address you have entered has already been invited.
_errors.mail_registered: Error: The mail address you have entered belongs to a registered user.
_errors.name_invalid: Error: You must enter the name of your hotel.
_errors.password_too_long: Error: The password you've entered is too long. Please use a maximum of 20 characters.
_errors.password_too_short: Error: Your password must have at least 6 characters.
_errors.passwordconfirm_unequal: Error: The passwords you have entered don't match.
_errors.phone_too_long: Error: The phone number you've entered is too long. Please use a maximum of 64 digits.
_errors.phone_too_short: Error: Your phone number must have at least 5 digits.
_errors.position_invalid: Error: You must choose a job position.
_errors.position_too_short: Error: You must enter your current job position.
_errors.recovery_failed: Error: This mail address is unknown.
_errors.region_invalid: Error: You must enter a region.
_errors.rooms_invalid: Error: You must enter a valid amount of rooms of your hotel (between 1 and 20.000).
_errors.sign_in_failed: Error: Sign in failed. Please check your credentials.
_errors.stars_invalid: Error: You must choose the rating of your hotel.
_errors.subline_too_long: Error: Your subline can not be longer than 100 characters.
_errors.subline_too_short: Error: Your subline must be at least 5 characters long.
_errors.terminate_job_incorrect_name: Error: You must enter the name of the job.
_errors.title_too_long: Error: Your title can not be longer than 100 characters.
_errors.title_too_short: Error: Your title must be at least 5 characters long.
_errors.transfer_master_role_incorrect_name: Error: You must enter the name of the member.
_errors.unexpected_error: Error: An unexpected error occured. Pleasy try again. If the problem persists, please contact us.
_errors.user_agreement: Error: You must accept our Terms & Conditions.
_errors.zip_invalid: Error: You must enter a zip code.
